title:
A characterization of quasi-homogeneous singularities of free and nearly
  free plane curves
authors: Aline V. Andrade, Valentina Beorchia, Rosa M. Mir\'o-Roig
abstract:
The goal of this paper is to establish a new and efficient characterization
of quasi-homogeneous isolated singularities of free curves and nearly free
curves $C$ in $\mathbb{P}^2$. The criterion will be in terms of the first
syzygy matrix associated with the Jacobian ideal of $f$ where $f=0$ is the
equation of the plane curve $C$.
